allow:
Bash(LC_ALL=C bash -c '
echo ""Testing basic functionality...""
mkdir -p ./test_data
echo ""✓ Directory creation works""

echo ""{\""test\"": \""data\""}"" | jq empty && echo ""✓ jq is available""

echo ""Testing data functions...""
source ./ado-tracker.sh
DATA_DIR=""./test_data""
BACKUP_DIR=""./test_data/backup""
save_json ""test.json"" ""{\""workitems\"": []}"" && echo ""✓ JSON save works""
load_json ""test.json"" | jq "".workitems"" >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo ""✓ JSON load works""

rm -rf ./test_data
echo ""✓ All basic functionality tests passed""
')
